# Campus Companion App - Project Setup Guide

## Project Overview
A unified campus app combining MERN stack with Web3 blockchain for managing class schedules, assignments, events, and secure student identification.

## Setup Progress
- [x] Copilot instructions created
- [x] Backend structure scaffolded
- [x] Frontend structure scaffolded
- [x] Blockchain contracts created
- [x] Configuration files added
- [x] Documentation completed

## Tech Stack
- Frontend: React.js with React Router, Axios, Material-UI
- Backend: Node.js, Express.js, JWT authentication
- Database: MongoDB with Mongoose
- Blockchain: Ethereum/Polygon with Hardhat, Ethers.js
- Notifications: WhatsApp Business API

## Key Features Implemented
- Multi-role dashboards (Student, Faculty, Club Admin, College Admin)
- Admin approval workflow with WhatsApp notifications
- Blockchain-based Student ID minting (YYCCAAxxxx format)
- Certificate and badge issuance on blockchain
- Event participation tracking
- Tamper-proof verification system
